name: The Cao WooCommerce
author: WebBinhDan.com

sections.description:
English

Free plugin add Recharge Card (VINA, MOBI, VIETTEL, VTC, GATE…) Payment Gateways for WooCommerce. You should install WooCommerce before setup The Cao WooCommerce.

More

  • Hope you enjoyed it!
  • Support to install and develop more advanced features.
  • Developed by WebBinhDan.

Tiếng Việt

Đây là plugin miễn phí nhằm tích hợp thanh toán bằng thẻ cào (VINA, MOBI, VIETTEL, VTC, GATE…) dành cho WooCommerce. Bạn nên cài đặt plugin WooCommerce trước The Cao WooCommerce.

Thêm

  • Hi vọng nhận được nhiều ý kiến đóng góp của bạn!
  • Hỗ trợ và phát triển thêm các tính nằng nâng cao tại đây.
  • Phát triển bởi WebBinhDan.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Setting > Payment Gateways then Active & configure Recharge Card (The Cao).
sections.faq:
Please contact with us directly if you have any problem to install or use the plugin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Setting > Payment Gateways then Active & configure Recharge Card (The Cao).
